languages.text: "Мне... нужно обдумать его смерть, Домин. Предстать перед Неумирающим, услышать его благословенный шепот. А позже... мы обсудим случившееся".
languages.translation_comment: Кибелла покидает активную партию и уходит, игрок остается на локации
Кибелла покидает активную партию и уходит, игрок остается на локации

languages.text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."
languages.original_text: "Мне... нужно обдумать его смерть, Домин. Предстать перед Неумирающим, услышать его благословенный шепот. А позже... мы обсудим случившееся".

traits.locale_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Enim. Stand before the Undying One and hear his blessed whisper. We may discussed what happened... at a later time."
"I... need to reflect on his death, Enim. Stand before the Undying One and hear his blessed whisper. We may discussed what happened... at a later time."
"I... need to reflect on his death, Enim, to stand before the Undying One and hear his blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... at a later time."
"I... need to reflect on his death, Enim, to stand before the Undying One and hear his blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... at a later time."
"I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."
"I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

languages.text: "Ich ... muss über seinen Tod nachdenken, Domin. Ich muss vor dem Todlosen stehen und Sein gesegnetes Flüstern hören. Wir können darüber reden, was passiert ist ... danach."
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... muss über seinen Tod nachzudenken, Domin. Ich muss vor dem Todlosen stehen und Sein gesegnetes Flüstern hören. Wir können darüber reden, was passiert ist ... danach."

languages.text: «Debo... debo reflexionar sobre su muerte, Domin. Debo arrodillarme frente al Inmortal y escuchar Su bendito susurro. Podremos hablar de lo ocurrido... más tarde».
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

traits.locale_text: «Debo... debo reflexionar sobre su muerte, Domin. Debo arrodillarme frente al Inmortal y escuchar Su bendito susurro. Podremos hablar de lo ocurrido... más tarde».

languages.text: 「私は…彼の死をよく考えなければいけない、ドミン。不死の者の前に立ち、その祝福の囁きに耳を傾けないと。起こったことは…後で話しましょう」
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…彼の死をよく考えなければいけない、エニム。不死の者の前に立ち、その祝福の囁きに耳を傾けないと。起こったことは…後で話しましょう」

languages.text: “我……需要仔细思考他的死亡，秘者。我需要站在不死之神面前聆听祂的祝福。我们可以讨论一下这件事情……等结束之后。”
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

traits.locale_text: “我……需要仔细思考他的死亡，秘者。我需要站在不死之神面前聆听祂的祝福。我们可以讨论一下这件事情……等结束之后。”

languages.text: « J'ai... besoin de réfléchir à cette mort, Domin. Je dois me présenter devant l'Immortel et écouter Son murmure sacré. Nous discuterons de tout cela... après. »
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... besoin de réfléchir à cette mort, Domin. Je dois me présenter devant l'Immortel et écouter Son murmure sacré. Nous discuterons de tout cela... après. »

languages.text: "Benim... Bu ölüm üzerine derinlemesine düşünmem gerek Domin. Ölmeyen'in huzuruna çıkıp kutsanmış fısıltılarını işitmeliyim. Yaşananları... Daha sonra tartışabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I... need to reflect on his death, Domin. I need to stand before the Undying One and hear His blessed whisper. We can discuss what happened... after."
